name: Subwoofer
description:
Subwoofer is a short Space Shooter prototype, I and Veuch made in a few months when we were learning how to use Unity.

Controls are super basic:

  • WASD to move.
  • Escape to pause/quit the game

You're playing a robotic manta ray  in the middle of the ocean and tons of wild fishes are rushing over you. Your goal is to reach and defeat their leader, the terrible Great Light Shark.
